page.title: 05Working for C and J Clark
page.content: More people work for{Clarks}in{ {Street}than for any other company.A lot of people are office workers.Most of the{Clarks}workers seem satisfied with their jobs and enjoy doing them.Some peoples jobs include going overseas. Most people have at least three holidays a year.The workers in Clarks are paid reasonable wages.In our survey not many people were hurt by machinery.Some of the Clarks workers have been there for over{forty {years.}A man can work in Clarks for fifty years,however a lady can only work in Clarks for 45 years.Lots of the Clarks workers that work in the factory find it noisy.Only two people in our survey have worked in Clarks for less than five years.In our survey there were 2 cleaners,works police, warehouse,office and factory workers.
